title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4815.9 - Disapproval procedure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4815.9 - Disapproval procedure

State Regulations

If the application is not approved, the commission shall
give due notice to the applicant, in writing, of a hearing to be held upon the
qualifications of the applicant and the merits of the application. At the
hearing the burden of proof shall be on the applicant to establish eligibility
for a license. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4815.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
